opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Muniz-Tapia v. United States De La Cruz v. United States and Tapia v. United States

opinion:
544 U.S. 997

MUNIZ-TAPIA
v.
UNITED STATES
DE LA CRUZ
v.
UNITED STATES; and
TAPIA
v.
UNITED STATES

No. 04-9317.

Supreme Court of United States.

April 25, 2005.

1

C. A. 5th Cir. Reported below: 115 Fed. Appx. 719 (first judgment), 733 (second judgment), and 755 (third judgment).

2

Motion of petitioners for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted, judgments vacated, and cases remanded for further consideration in light of United States v. Booker, 543 U. S. 220 (2005).
